title: Hellfire
desc:
Post 625
- When this is played, it goes in your identity card.
- Instead of playing on the card pile, you can now play <:inferno:1118594776716021780> cards in here if you could play them normally in the play pile
- If there are four <:inferno:1118594776716021780> in this pile, all other players draw until they get another <:inferno:1118594776716021780> card and all <:inferno:1118594776716021780> in here are discarded
